title: Gangplank skins keep giving me "Invalid_Skin"
body:
I bought Gankplank skins Sultan and Spec. Ops and  when I try to use them, it keeps kicking me back to "Invalid Skin" and refusing to let me play any games.

I'm rapidly moving from annoyed to infuriated.

replies.body:
Hey Winter Smite,

Have you checked the Champion Details Page to see if they're available/owned? Gifts/buying content and then utilizing a chargeback causes removal of content from a player's account, since the content wasn't actually paid for. 

If you do own the content, are you getting this error 100% of the time/is it happening in a specific queue?
